Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseL_01><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Huh? Link?!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>You're back! I thought things felt different
around here!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_01>I knew you'd escape the castle. You are
<clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>'s swordsman, after all!<sp:0:4:0>By the way, where's the princess? I can't
wait to welcome her back!
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>I'm so relieved to see you back at
last, Link!<sp:0:4:0>The journey here must have been
difficult. Please, get whatever rest you
need here at Lookout Landing.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, it's a big relief having you back.<sp:0:4:0>I'm sure you've been through a lot,
returning to us. So, just know that
Lookout Landing is here for you.
Be sure to get some rest, Link.
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>You looked so heroic when you soared
from our <clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff> here!

I helped construct the tower, since we're
short on workers.

Ever since it was finished, we all
wondered who'd be brave enough
to launch for the first time.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>Of course it was you, Link!
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Princess Zelda must still be stuck up
there in <clr:0000>Hyrule Castle<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01><clr:ffff>I wonder. If I used the <clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff>,
could I launch high enough to... No,
that won't work.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>I'm so scared of heights—even being
up here makes me a bit trembly.
Talk_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Hello, Link! I was hoping you'd come up
and talk to me.

To be honest, I saw you from the top of
the wall as soon as you got back.

You looked a little preoccupied, so I
decided not to say anything.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughL_00>Anyway, you looked brilliant soaring
through the sky just now!

We're short on workers, so I actually
helped construct the <clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff>.

Ever since it was finished, we all
wondered who'd be brave enough to
launch for the first time.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>Should've guessed it would be you.
Near_03: No biggie! Just a little rain!
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Poor <clr:0000>Princess Zelda<clr:ffff>. She must still be
stuck in Hyrule Castle.<sp:0:4:0>We have to rescue her... But how do we
get up there?
Talk_17: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy_00>Hey, Link! Thanks for all your hard work!
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>If I could, I'd go and save Princess Zelda
myself right now.<sp:0:4:0>But how can I get to Hyrule Castle?
It's so high up!
BlackZelda_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Link! Did you hear? <clr:0000>Princess Zelda <clr:ffff>was
spotted up in Hyrule Castle!<sp:0:4:0>We need to get her down somehow!
It's not safe being that high up!

<sp:3:0:2:0200>Grrr...<sp:5:0:0> Curse my debilitating fear
of heights!

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>If I was even a foot higher than this, my
legs would be stone stiff right now.
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Happy_00>Watch out, Link! Get to cover before the
lightning hits you!
Talk_08:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01><clr:ffff>I wonder. If I used the <clr:0000>Skyview Tower<clr:ffff>,
could I launch high enough to...
No, never mind.<sp:5:1:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I'm so scared of heights—even being up
here makes me a bit trembly.
BlackZelda_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>Poor Princess Zelda, stuck way up there
all on her own!<sp:0:4:0>We have to go get her soon!
